sourcesContent:
<template>
    <input type="text" id="datepicker" v-model="this.getDate" @click="getDatepicker()" />
    {{ this.getDate }}
</template>

<script>
import $ from "jquery"
export default {
    data() {
        return {
            getDate: "",
        }
    },
    methods: {
        getDatepicker() {
            let select = this
            $('#datepicker').datepicker({
                format: "dd/mm/yyyy",
                autoclose: true,
                toggleActive: true,
            });
            $('#datepicker_edit').change(() => {
                select.getDate = $('#datepicker_edit').val();
            });
        },
    }
}
</script>
